alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 4:27AM EDT until April 09 at 3:01AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Breakabeen. * WHEN...From this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, There is about a foot of water on low parts of Route 30. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4 AM EDT Friday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:01 AM EDT Friday was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Breakabeen Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 4 am: 12.5 Fri 8 am 13.0 Fri 2 pm 12.1 Fri 8 pm 10.1 Sat 2 am 7.5 Sat 8 am 6.0 Sat 2 pm 5.2 Sat 8 pm 4.9 Sun 2 am 4.7 Sun 8 am 4.4 Sun 2 pm 4.1 Sun 8 pm 3.8 &&
